title: $260 Million Tyler Perry Assault Lawsuit Rocks Hollywood – Full Explosive Details
shortdescription: Actor from 'The Oval' accuses Perry of years of harassment and retaliation.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: /images/$260 Million Tyler Perry Assault Lawsuit Rocks Hollywood.webp

Tyler Perry has been slapped with a staggering $260 million lawsuit by actor Derek Dixon (The Oval), who alleges years of sexual assault, harassment, and retaliation — including being blacklisted after rejecting Perry’s advances.
The suit claims Perry used his power to demand sexual favors in exchange for roles and threatened to destroy careers if refused.
Perry’s team calls the allegations “completely false and defamatory,” vowing to fight in court. But several former employees have come forward anonymously supporting Dixon’s story.
